description:
If you already have some basic knowledge of Spanish and you would like to express yourself better and with fluency, than this course is perfect for you. You will gain all the knowledge necessary to maintain the conversation (in free time or at work) with a Spanish speaker without a problem and you will be able to understand, speak,write and read in Spanish correctly and clearly.

Master Spanish Language Quickly Using Image Supported Method.

In this course you will learn to:

  • talk about the present, past and future
  • ask for direction on the street
  • express wishes, suggestions, advice
  • understand more complex oral and written texts
  • be able to use more specific words and phrases

Learn to speak Spanish clearly and fluently.

We will learn to talk what will happen in hundred years from now, we will read a story about a girl Oliva and learn past tenses. If you are not sure when to use the verb ser and when the verb estar, we will address also this question. You will also be able to describe a character and a physical appearance of a person.

All topics,with the eye-catching and colourful images, of the course have been chosen to grab your attention so that you can learn as much and as easy as possible.

With this course you will be able to communicate in Spanish smoothly and with confidence, you will gain sufficient knowledge to express yourself in informal and formal real life situations.

You will also gain a skill to evaluate yourself: the course is made up of 11 sections and 12 lectures and each section has a quiz to check what have you learned.

By following and completing all lectures, you will receive a verifiable certificate at the end of the course.
title: Intermediate Spanish - take your Spanish to the next level!
